specials.name: Tongue Grab
specials.description: If the furcifer hits a creature with its tongue, that creature becomes grabbed by the furcifer. Unlike with a normal grab, the creature isn’t immobilized, but it can’t move beyond the reach of the furcifer’s tongue. A creature can sever the tongue by hitting AC 25 and dealing at least 45 slashing damage. Though this doesn’t deal any damage to the furcifer, it prevents it from using its tongue Strike until it regrows its tongue, which takes a week.

specials.name: Pull
specials.description: Requirements The furcifer has currently grabbed a creature using it's tongue grab ability. Effect The furcifer rolls an athletics check versus the grabbed creatures fortitude DC.  If successful the creature is pulled toward the furcifer (15 ft).  If critically successful that distance is doubled and the furcifer may immediately attempt to swallow whole if that brings the creature adjacent.  If a critical failure the creature is released.

specials.name: Utopia
specials.description: With it's ability to constant detect the base thoughts of creatures around it the furcifer fashions an alternate reality as the spell Hallucination (8th) (DC 32 basic Will).  The furcifer has an animal's intelligence and an alien understanding so it builds a bizarre reality that IT thinks appeals to its victims.  The furcifer itself becomes part of the spell and is disguised as something non threatening and treated as if invisible.

specials.name: Deleriant Aura
specials.description:
All creatures within 50 ft. of a furcifer must make a basic Will Save DC 32.  
Critical Failure Stupefied 2 for 10 minutes and receives no save to the Utopia ability
Failure Stupefied 2 for 1 minute
Success No effect
Critical Success Treats any save vs. Utopia as one level higher

perception.note: darkvision, low-light vision, motion sense 60 feet
